caption.p: Distance walked and resting time (mean ± SEM) of S. granarius subjected to lemongrass essential oil, citral, and geranyl acetate (control, LD 50, and LD 90 estimated values) for 10 min. Treatments (mean ± SEM) differ at p < 0.05 (Tukey’s mean separation test). Values in the same column with different letters show significant differences by Tukey’s HSD test.
